This LinkedIn post by Shriniwas Kulkarni celebrates World Quantum Day (April 14th) and explains its connection to Planck's constant.  It highlights global and Indian celebrations, encouraging everyone to learn and share a quantum fact.  The post includes hashtags like #WorldQuantumDay, #QuantumScience, #QuantumComputing, and #QuantumIndia.
